name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: ID of the status in the database.

name: uri
description: Description: URI of the status used for federation.

name: created_at
description: Description: The date when this status was created.

name: account
description: Description: The account that authored this status.

name: content
description: Description: HTML-encoded status content.

name: visibility
description: Description: Visibility of this status.

name: sensitive
description: Description: Is this status marked as sensitive content?

name: spoiler_text
description: Description: Subject or summary line, below which status content is collapsed until expanded.

name: media_attachments
description: Description: Media that is attached to this status.

name: application OPTIONAL
description: Description: The application used to post this status.

name: application[name]
description: Description: The name of the application that posted this status.

name: application[website]
description: Description: The website associated with the application that posted this status.

name: mentions
description: Description: Mentions of users within the status content.

name: tags
description: Description: Hashtags used within the status content.

name: emojis
description: Description: Custom emoji to be used when rendering status content.

name: reblogs_count
description: Description: How many boosts this status has received.

name: favourites_count
description: Description: How many favourites this status has received.

name: replies_count
description: Description: How many replies this status has received.

name: url
description: Description: A link to the status’s HTML representation.

name: in_reply_to_id
type: Type: NULLABLE String (cast from an integer but not guaranteed to be a number) or null
description: Description: ID of the status being replied to.

name: in_reply_to_account_id
type: Type: NULLABLE String (cast from an integer but not guaranteed to be a number) or null
description: Description: ID of the account that authored the status being replied to.

name: reblog
description: Description: The status being reblogged.

name: poll
description: Description: The poll attached to the status.

name: card
description: Description: Preview card for links included within status content.

name: language
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 639 Part 1 two-letter language code) or null
description: Description: Primary language of this status.

name: text
description: Description: Plain-text source of a status. Returned instead of content when status is deleted, so the user may redraft from the source text without the client having to reverse-engineer the original text from the HTML content.

name: edited_at
description: Description: Timestamp of when the status was last edited.

name: favourited OPTIONAL
description: Description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you favourited this status?

name: reblogged OPTIONAL
description: Description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you boosted this status?

name: muted OPTIONAL
description: Description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you muted notifications for this status’s conversation?

name: bookmarked OPTIONAL
description: Description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you bookmarked this status?

name: pinned OPTIONAL
description: Description: If the current token has an authorized user: Have you pinned this status? Only appears if the status is pinnable.

name: filtered OPTIONAL
description: Description: If the current token has an authorized user: The filter and keywords that matched this status.
